name: Whirlpool of Wonders
description:
Card game with a lot of random mechanics. You move the ship each turn (WASD or arrows), AI do the same. Some cards will help you, some of them gives gold and some of them... You will see :) More information about cards and rules you can find in the game menu.

Game created for GMTK 2022

Preexisting art and models: island from the main menu and water shader

Icons is made by Delapouite, Lorc and Skoll (I just work with the color and bacjkground)

"Jaar" soundeffect made by Fusehive

Other art, 3D models, sound effects, music and gameplay created by the author for this Jam. Good luck :)
